identifier: texas style roofing and remodeling:arlington, tx

data.name: Texas Style Roofing and Remodeling
data.address: 4621 S Cooper St ste 131 #206, Arlington, TX 76017

reviews.text: Great all around experience from inspection to  starting the process and filing my first claim as a first time home owner to the great work done on the home. Mohu will walk you through the entire process. The new quality roof really added great curb appeal from the previous low quality job done by another company. They cleaned up nicely afterwards which really made for a smooth an easy process! Definite recommend.

Me and my wife were very apprehensive because of the stories we hear about roofing companies in there scams let me tell you something. Moho was our savior. He did a phenomenal job and walked us through the process with ease. Our house looks amazing. Thank you Moho you’re the best.

The owner was always available whenever we had any questions! He was very thorough and communicated clearly with us and the insurance company to get everything on our roof replaced for the right price and coverage. On top of that, the guys day of got the job done so quickly and left our yard clean like they were never there!

Very professional and easy to work with. This is the second time I have used to company. They did a great job on the roof of my old house so when I had hail damage to my new home, I called them again.  Very prompt service from first meeting until roof completed. Paid attention to details and left yard in perfect condition when new roofing was done.

Mo and his team were exceptional and always willing to answer any little questions we had. They were patient and thoroughly professional. My new gutters are better then my old ones, and the new vents seems to already be working better.
Great quality work would highly recommend. Mohu and his team made sure everything was handled and cleaned properly. Old roof was beat and tattered by hail damage but the new roof looks great!

“ The roofing crew was very organized and was committed to complete the roof project in a timely manner.  They did an excellent job of cleaning up after the roofing job, were very friendly, and responded to our questions. Mo was the Project Manager and came to observe the project at least three times during the day and returned when the project was over to do a final inspection. Thank you Mo and the Texas Style roofing crew ! “
Not only did these do a great job on my roof, but they also have me a popsicle!! 10/10 would recommend!!
These guys did a great job with my roof. Very professional and super nice. 10/10
Great crew! They did great our roof looks awesome
Dude what this efficient crew was incredible had no trouble and they were all pretty nice would highly recommend
Very professional and my roof looks fantastic thanks guys super fast and easy
We are good on the roof right now, but Lakeland was very professional and a sweetheart.
Great guys that made my roof and gutters look beautiful!!!
Great service. My roof looks great!!
Stand up guys and gals! Very knowledgeable!
Very clean roof and very happy with results
Wonderful people involved with this company !!
Honest people, that get their work done!
Best roofing company ever
Best roofing company ever
My roof looks amazing!!!
